sentences.en: A barge was about a hundred yards away, waiting to return seaward.
sentences.cn: 一艘驳船停在大约100码开外，等待着返海回航。

sentences.en: He stopped a hundred yards short of the building.
sentences.cn: 他在离大楼100码处停下了。

sentences.en: He walked two hundred and sixty miles in eight days.
sentences.cn: 他在8天里走了260英里的路。

sentences.en: Her orbital speed must be a few hundred meters per second.
sentences.cn: 其轨道速度一定是在每秒几百米。

sentences.en: I pushed on towards Flagstaff, a hundred miles to the west.
sentences.cn: 我继续西行，向100英里外的弗拉格斯塔夫进发。

sentences.en: I'm not a hundred per cent sure.
sentences.cn: 我不十分确定。

sentences.en: I’m not a hundred percent sure where she lives.
sentences.cn: 我不能完全确定她住在哪里。

sentences.en: Its own estimate of three hundred tallies with that of another survey.
sentences.cn: 其估计数目300与另一项调查的结果相吻合。

sentences.en: More than nine hundred people have died in the fighting.
sentences.cn: 900多人在这场战斗中丧生。

sentences.en: More than one hundred police have ringed the area.
sentences.cn: 这一地区已被上百名警察包围。

sentences.en: Plank down your one hundred dollars.
sentences.cn: 立即支付一百美元。

sentences.en: Several hundred people twirl around the ballroom dance floor.
sentences.cn: 几百人在舞厅的舞池里旋转。

sentences.en: Take a hundred and twenty values and calculate the mean.
sentences.cn: 取120个值计算平均数。

sentences.en: The factory's workforce has dwindled from over 4,000 to a few hundred.
sentences.cn: 工厂雇员总数已经从4,000多人减少到几百人。

sentences.en: The men were maybe a hundred feet away and coming closer.
sentences.cn: 那些人大约有100英尺远，正在向这里靠近。

sentences.en: The tree was probably a hundred years old.
sentences.cn: 这棵树很可能已经有100年了。

sentences.en: They sweltered in temperatures rising to a hundred degrees.
sentences.cn: 接近华氏100度的高温让他们感觉酷热难耐。

sentences.en: They’ve had this argument a hundred times before.
sentences.cn: 这个问题他们以前已经争论过无数次了。

sentences.en: Three hundred million dollars will be nothing like enough.
sentences.cn: 3亿美元远远不够。

sentences.en: Three hundred thousand tons of cereals are needed to replenish stocks.
sentences.cn: 需要30万吨谷类补充库存。

words.tran_cn: 第一百的；一百分之一的
第一百，第一百个；百分之一

phrases.tran_cn: 一百与一之比；可能性极大
五百分（牌戏，一种以得500分为胜局的游戏）
n. [史]百日王朝（拿破仑一世第二次统治法国时期的称谓，从1815年3月20日至6月28日）

trans.tran_en: a very large number of things or people

trans.tran_cn: 一百，许多，100 到 999 间的数目，某个世纪的年代
